Big Jan Battle (Age of Sigmar) [2,500pts]

  • **Pitched Battle** (Order - Stormcast Eternals) [2,500pts]

    Rules: At the Double, Forward to Victory, Inspiring Presence

    • Leader [960pts]

      • Astreia Solbright [200pts]

        Selections: 1. Lightning Blast, Aetherstave, Monstrous Claws

        Categories: ASTREIA SOLBRIGHT, DRACOLINE, CELESTIAL, HUMAN, ORDER, HAMMERS OF SIGMAR, STORMCAST ETERNALS, SACROSANCT, HERO, WIZARD, LORD-ARCANUM, Leader

        Command Abilities: Soul Energy of the First Host, Magic: Astreia Solbright, Spell: Arcane Bolt, Lightning Blast, Lightning Pulse, Mystic Shield, Unit: Astreia Solbright, Unit Abilities: Cycle of the Storm, Mount, Prime Electrids, Spirit Flask, Supernatural Roar, Thunderous Pounce, Weapon: Aetherstave, Monstrous Claws


        Command Abilities Command Ability Details
        Soul Energy of the First Host You can use this ability in your hero phase, your shooting phase, or the combat phase. Hero Phase: If you use this command ability in your hero phase, pick a friendly unit of HAMMERS OF SIGMAR EVOCATORS wholly within 12" of a friendly model with this command ability. That unit can automatically cast Empower in that hero phase (no casting roll is required, and the spell cannot be unbound). Shooting Phase: If you use this command ability in your shooting phase, pick a friendly unit of HAMMERS OF SIGMAR CASTIGATORS wholly within 12" of a friendly model with this command ability. You can use Aetheric Channelling to increase the accuracy and power of the unit's Thunderhead Greatbows in that shooting phase instead of choosing only one of those options. Combat Phase: If you use this command ability in the combat phase, pick a friendly unit of HAMMERS OF SIGMAR SEQUITORS wholly within 12" of a friendly model with this command ability. You can use Aetheric Channelling to increase the power of the unit's weapons and shields in that combat phase instead of choosing only one of those options.
        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known
        Astreia Solbright 1/1Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield and Lightning Pulse
        Spell Casting ValueDescription
        Arcane Bolt 5If successfully cast, pick an enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If the casting roll was 10 or more, the unit suffers D3 mortal wounds instead.
        Lightning Blast 5If successfully cast, the closest enemy unit that is visible to the caster suffers D3 mortal wounds. If more than one enemy unit visible to the caster is equally close, you can pick which unit is affected.
        Lightning Pulse 5If successfully cast, roll a dice for each enemy unti within 12" of the caster that is visible to them. On a 5+, that unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
        Mystic Shield 6If successfully cast, pick a friendly unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. Re-roll save rolls of 1 for that unit until your next hero phase.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave
        Astreia Solbright 12"793+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Cycle of the Storm Once per turn, when a friendly STORMCAST ETERNAL model is slain within 18" of this model, instead of removing the slain model, you can heal 1 wound allocated to it. This model cannot use this ability on itself.
        Mount Astreia’s Dracoline, Kazra, attacks with its Monstrous Claws.
        Prime Electrids If this model successfully casts Arcane Bolt and it is not unbound, then the spell inflicts D3 mortal wounds instead of 1, or D6 mortal wounds instead of D3 if the casting roll was 10+.
        Spirit Flask Once per battle, at the start of the combat phase, you can say that this model will shatter 1, 2 or 3 spirit flasks. If you do so, each unit within 3" of this model suffers 1 mortal wound for each spirit flask that was shattered. Units with 10 or more models suffer D3 mortal wounds for each spirit flask that was shattered instead. Allocate the mortal wounds to this model last of all, after allocating them to any other units that are affected.
        Supernatural Roar Subtract 1 from the Bravery characteristic of enemy units when they are within 3" of one or more friendly DRACOLINES.
        Thunderous Pounce You can re-roll charge rolls for this model. In addition, the Damage characteristic for this model's Monstrous Claws is D3 instead of 1 if this model made a charge move in the same turn.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage
        Aetherstave Melee2"43+3+-1D3
        Monstrous Claws Melee1"33+3+-11

      • Knight-Incantor [120pts]

        Selections: 1. Lightning Blast, Incantor’s Staff

        Categories: CELESTIAL, HERO, HUMAN, ORDER, SACROSANCT, STORMCAST ETERNALS, WIZARD, Leader, KNIGHT-INCANTOR

        Magic: Knight-Incantor, Spell: Arcane Bolt, Lightning Blast, Mystic Shield, Spirit Storm, Unit: Knight-Incantor, Unit Abilities: Spirit Flask, Voidstorm Scroll, Weapon: Incantor’s Staff


        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known
        Knight-Incantor 1/1Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield and Spirit Storm
        Spell Casting ValueDescription
        Arcane Bolt 5If successfully cast, pick an enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If the casting roll was 10 or more, the unit suffers D3 mortal wounds instead.
        Lightning Blast 5If successfully cast, the closest enemy unit that is visible to the caster suffers D3 mortal wounds. If more than one enemy unit visible to the caster is equally close, you can pick which unit is affected.
        Mystic Shield 6If successfully cast, pick a friendly unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. Re-roll save rolls of 1 for that unit until your next hero phase.
        Spirit Storm 7If successfully cast, each enemy unit within 18" of the caster suffers 1 mortal wound. In addition, until your next hero phase, subtract 1 from run and charge rolls for enemy units while they are within 18" of the caster.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave
        Knight-Incantor 5"593+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Spirit Flask Once per battle, at the start of the combat phase, you can say that this model will shatter 1, 2 or 3 spirit flasks. If you do so, each unit within 3" of this model suffers 1 mortal wound for each spirit flask that was shattered. Units with 10 or more models suffer D3 mortal wounds for each spirit flask that was shattered instead. Allocate the mortal wounds to this model last of all, after allocating them to any other units that are affected.
        Voidstorm Scroll Once per battle, when this model attempts to unbind a spell, instead of making an unbinding roll you can say this model is using its Voidstorm Scroll. If you do so, the spell is automatically unbound (do not roll the dice).
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage
        Incantor’s Staff Melee2"33+3+-1D3

      • Knight-Venator [110pts]

        Selections: Bow Stave, Celestial Beak and Talons, Realmhunter's Bow

        Categories: CELESTIAL, HERO, HUMAN, KNIGHT-VENATOR, ORDER, STORMCAST ETERNALS, Leader

        Unit: Knight-Venator, Unit Abilities: Celestial Strike, Companion, Fly, Star-fated Arrow, Weapon: Bow Stave, Celestial Beak and Talons, Celestial Beak and Talons (Missile), Realmhunter's Bow


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave
        Knight-Venator 12"593+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Celestial Strike If the unmodified wound roll for an attack made with a Star-eagle’s Celestial Beak and Talons is 6, that attack has a Rend characteristic of -3 instead of ‘-’.
        Companion A Knight-Venator is accompanied by a Star-eagle that attacks with its Celestial Beak and Talons. For rules purposes, it is treated in the same manner as a mount.
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Star-fated Arrow Once per battle, in your shooting phase, this model can shoot a Star-fated Arrow. If it does so, until the end of that phase, the Attacks characteristic of this model’s Realmhunter’s Bow is reduced to 1, but it has a Damage characteristic of D3+3 instead of 1. If the target is a HERO or MONSTER, this weapon has a Damage characteristic of D6+3 until the end of that phase instead.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage
        Bow Stave Melee1"23+4+-1
        Celestial Beak and Talons Melee1"34+3+-1
        Celestial Beak and Talons (Missile) Missile30"34+3+-1
        Realmhunter's Bow Missile30"32+3+-11

      • Lord-Aquilor [170pts]

        Selections: 0. Deathly Aura, 0. Soulthief, General, Heavy Boltstorm Pistol, Razor Beak and Claws, Shock Handaxe, Starbound Blade

        Categories: CELESTIAL, HERO, HUMAN, LORD-AQUILOR, ORDER, STORMCAST ETERNALS, GRYPH-CHARGER, Leader, General, Artefact

        Artefact: Soulthief, Command Abilities: Lord of the Azyrite Hurricane, Command Trait: Deathly Aura, Unit: Lord-Aquilor, Unit Abilities: Aethereal Strike, Astral Compass, Mount, Ride the Winds Aetheric, Weapon: Heavy Boltstorm Pistol, Razor Beak and Claws, Shock Handaxe, Starbound Blade


        Artefact Artefact Details
        Soulthief Pick one of the bearer’s melee weapons. At the end of the combat phase, roll a dice for each enemy model that was allocated any wounds caused by this weapon in that combat phase. On a 3+ that model suffers 1 mortal wound.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details
        Lord of the Azyrite Hurricane You can use this command ability at the end of your movement phase. If you do so, pick a friendly model with this command ability. Remove that model, and/or one friendly unit of VANGUARD-HUNTERS, VANGUARD-PALLADORS, VANGUARD-RAPTORS or AETHERWINGS wholly within 24" of that model, from the battlefield and set them up wholly within 6" of any edge of the battlefield, more than 7" from any enemy units.
        Command Trait Command Trait Details
        Deathly Aura Subtract 1 from the Bravery characteristic of enemy units while they are within 6" of this general.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave
        Lord-Aquilor 12"793+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Aethereal Strike If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a Gryph-charger’s Razor Beak and Claws is 6, that attack inflicts 1 mortal wound on the target and the attack sequence ends (do not make a wound or save roll).
        Astral Compass If you set up a unit that includes any models with an Astral Compass in the Celestial Realm using the Scions of the Storm battle trait, when you set it up on the battlefield for the first time, instead of setting it up more than 9" from the enemy, you can set it up wholly within 6" of any edge of the battlefield, more than 7" from the enemy.
        Mount This model’s Gryph-charger attacks with its Razor Beak and Claws.
        Ride the Winds Aetheric In your movement phase, this model can Ride the Winds Aetheric instead of moving normally. If it does so, choose the direction in which it will move, and roll 6D6. This model can move up to a number of inches equal to the result in the direction chosen, moving over terrain and other models as if it could fly. It must end the move more than 3" from enemy models – if this is impossible, it cannot move at all. This model cannot charge in a turn in which it Rides the Winds Aetheric.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage
        Heavy Boltstorm Pistol Missile9"43+3+-1
        Razor Beak and Claws Melee1"33+3+-21
        Shock Handaxe Melee1"23+3+-1
        Starbound Blade Melee1"33+3+-12

      • Lord-Relictor [100pts]

        Selections: 5. God-King's Aspect, Relic Hammer

        Categories: CELESTIAL, HERO, HUMAN, LORD-RELICTOR, PRIEST, ORDER, STORMCAST ETERNALS, Leader

        Prayer: God-King's Aspect, Unit: Lord-Relictor, Unit Abilities: Healing Storm, Lightning Storm, Weapon: Relic Hammer


        Prayer Description
        God-King's Aspect In your hero phase, this PRIEST can take on Sigmar’s appearance. If they do so, roll a dice. On a 3+ the prayer is successful. If the prayer is successful, until your next hero phase, subtract 1 from the Bravery characteristic of enemy units while they are within 6" of this PRIEST.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave
        Lord-Relictor 4"593+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Healing Storm In your hero phase, you can pick a friendly STORMCAST ETERNAL model within 12" of this model and roll a dice. On a 3+ you can heal up to D3 wounds that have been allocated to that model. A Lord-Relictor cannot use the Lightning Storm and Healing Storm abilities in the same turn.
        Lightning Storm In your hero phase, you can pick 1 enemy unit that is within 12" of this model and roll a dice. On a 3+, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. In addition, subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made by that unit until your next hero phase. A Lord-Relictor cannot use the Lightning Storm and Healing Storm abilities in the same turn.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage
        Relic Hammer Melee1"43+3+-11

      • Vandus Hammerhand [260pts]

        Selections: 2. Thunder Caller, Claws and Fangs, Heldensen

        Categories: CELESTIAL, HERO, HUMAN, LORD-CELESTANT, VANDUS HAMMERHAND, ORDER, STORMCAST ETERNALS, DRACOTH, HAMMERS OF SIGMAR, Leader

        Command Trait: Vengeful Determination, Unit: Vandus Hammerhand, Unit Abilities: Heldensen, Intolerable Damage, Lord of the Hammerhands, Mount, Storm Breath, Thunder Caller, Weapon: Claws and Fangs, Heldensen


        Command Trait Command Trait Details
        Vengeful Determination You can use this command ability at the start of the combat phase. If you do so, until the end of that phase, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly HAMMERS OF SIGMAR units while they are wholly within 12" of a friendly model with this command ability.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave
        Vandus Hammerhand 10"793+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Heldensen Add D3 to the Attacks characteristic of Heldensen if this model made a charge move in the same turn.
        Intolerable Damage If the unmodified wound roll for an attack made with a Dracoth’s Claws and Fangs is 6, that attack has a Damage characteristic of D6 instead of 1.
        Lord of the Hammerhands Friendly HAMMERS OF SIGMAR units wholly within 24" of this model at the start of the battleshock phase do not take battleshock tests.
        Mount Vandus’ Dracoth, Calanax, attacks with its Claws and Fangs.
        Storm Breath In your shooting phase, you can pick a point on the battlefield within 12" of this model that is visible to them. Roll a dice for each enemy unit within 2" of that point. On a 4+ that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Thunder Caller This model’s Storm Breath ability has a range of 16" rather than 12".
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage

      • Celestar Ballista [110pts]

        Selections: Celestar Stormbolts, Sigmarite Blades

        Celestar Ballista 3"774+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Bastions of Death When this unit is targeted by an enemy missile weapon, add 2 to its save rolls if it is in cover instead of 1.
        Celestar Ballista The Ballista and its crew are treated as a single model. The crew must remain within 1" of the Ballista.
        Chained Lightning If the hit roll for an attack made with a Celestar Stormbolt scores a hit, that attack inflicts D6 hits on the target instead of 1. Make a wound and save roll for each hit.
        Versatile Weapon Before attacking with Celestar Stormbolts, choose either the Single Shot or Rapid Fire missile weapon characteristics for that shooting attack.

If you choose power, this unit’s Thunderhead Greatbows have a Rend characteristic of -2 instead of -1 in that shooting phase.

        Gryph-Hounds 9"36-
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Darting Attacks Each time this unit attacks, it can make a 6" retreat move after all of its attacks have been resolved.

        Loyal Companion Add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s Beak and Claws while this unit is wholly within 6" of a friendly LORD-CASTELLANT or LORD-VERITANT.
        Warning Cry If a reserve enemy unit is set up on the battlefield for the first time within 10" of this unit, friendly STORMCAST ETERNAL units wholly within 9" of this unit can attack that reserve unit with all of the missile weapons they are armed with. A unit that uses this ability to attack a reserve unit cannot use this ability to attack another reserve unit in the same phase.

      • Retributors [190pts]

        Selections: 5 Retributors [190pts], Lightning Hammer, 2x Starsoul Mace

        Categories: CELESTIAL, HUMAN, PALADIN, RETRIBUTORS, ORDER, STORMCAST ETERNALS, Other

        Unit: Retributor, Unit Abilities: Blast to Ashes, Retributor-Prime, Starsoul Mace, Weapon: Lightning Hammer, Starsoul Mace


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave
        Retributor 4"374+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Blast to Ashes If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a Lightning Hammer is 6, that attack inflicts 2 mortal wounds on the target and the attack sequence ends (do not make a wound or save roll).
        Retributor-Prime The leader of this unit is a Retributor-Prime. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of a Retributor-Prime’s Lightning Hammer.
        Starsoul Mace Do not use the attack sequence for an attack made with a Starsoul Mace. Instead, roll a dice. On a 1, nothing happens. On a 2-5, the target unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. On a 6+, the target unit suffers D3+1 mortal wounds.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage
        Lightning Hammer Melee1"23+3+-12

      • Sequitors [120pts]

        Selections: 5 Sequitors [120pts], 2x Stormsmite Greatmace, Stormsmite Greatmace (Sequitor-Prime), Stormsmite Maul and Soulshield

        Categories: CELESTIAL, HUMAN, ORDER, SACROSANCT, STORMCAST ETERNALS, SEQUITORS, REDEEMER, Other

        Unit: Sequitor, Unit Abilities: Greatmace Blast, Sequitor Aetheric Channelling, Sequitor-Prime, Soulshields, Weapon: Stormsmite Greatmace, Stormsmite Maul


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave
        Sequitor 5"274+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Greatmace Blast If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a Stormsmite Greatmace that targets a DAEMON or NIGHTHAUNT unit is 6, that attack inflicts D3 hits on the target instead of 1. Make a wound and save roll for each hit.
        Sequitor Aetheric Channelling At the start of the combat phase, you must say if this unit will channel aetheric power into its weapons or its shields. If you choose its weapons, you can re-roll failed hit rolls for attacks made by this unit in that combat phase. If you choose its shields, you can re-roll failed save rolls for attacks that target this unit in that combat phase (instead of only re-rolling save rolls of 1).
        Sequitor-Prime The leader of this unit is a Sequitor-Prime. A Sequitor-Prime can replace the unit’s weapon option with a Stormsmite Greatmace, in addition to any other models in the unit that can do so. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of a Sequitor-Prime’s melee weapon. If a Sequitor-Prime is armed with a Stormsmite Maul and Soulshield or Tempest Blade and Soulshield, they may also carry a Redemption Cache.
        Soulshields You can re-roll save rolls of 1 for attacks that target this unit if any models from this unit are carrying a Soulshield.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage
        Stormsmite Greatmace Melee1"23+3+-12
        Stormsmite Maul Melee123+3+-1

      • Vanguard-Palladors [170pts]

        Selections: 3 Vanguard-Palladors [170pts], Boltstorm Pistol, Razor Beak and Claws, Starstrike Javelin

        Categories: ANGELOS, CELESTIAL, HUMAN, VANGUARD-PALLADORS, ORDER, STORMCAST ETERNALS, Other

        Unit: Vanguard-Pallador, Unit Abilities: Aethereal Strike, Lunar Blade, Mount, Pallador-Prime, Ride the Winds Aetheric, Weapon: Boltstorm Pistol, Razor Beak and Claws, Starstrike Javelin, Starstrike Javelin (Missile)


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave
        Vanguard-Pallador 12"574+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Aethereal Strike If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a Gryph-charger’s Razor Beak and Claws is 6, that attack inflicts 1 mortal wound on the target and the attack sequence ends (do not make a wound or save roll).
        Lunar Blade Each time a model armed with a Lunar Blade attacks, after all of that model’s attacks have been resolved, you can pick 1 enemy unit within 1" of that model and roll a dice. On a 2+ the unit you picked suffers 1 mortal wound.
        Mount This unit’s Gryph-chargers attack with their Razor Beak and Claws.
        Pallador-Prime The leader of this unit is a Pallador-Prime. A Pallador-Prime is armed with a Lunar Blade in addition to their other weapons.
        Ride the Winds Aetheric In your movement phase, this model can Ride the Winds Aetheric instead of moving normally. If it does so, choose the direction in which it will move, and roll 6D6. This model can move up to a number of inches equal to the result in the direction chosen, moving over terrain and other models as if it could fly. It must end the move more than 3" from enemy models – if this is impossible, it cannot move at all. This model cannot charge in a turn in which it Rides the Winds Aetheric.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage
        Boltstorm Pistol Missile9"23+4+-1

    • Allegiance

      • Allegiance

        Categories: Allegiance

        • Allegiance: Stormcast Eternals

          Selections: Anvils of the Heldenhammer

          Battle Trait: No True Death, Scions of the Storm, Shock and Awe, Stormhosts, Command Abilities: Heroes of Another Age


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details
        No True Death You can re-roll failed battleshock tests for friendly ANVILS OF THE HELDENHAMMER units.
        Scions of the Storm Instead of setting up a STORMCAST ETERNAL unit on the battlefield, you can place it to one side and say that it is set up in the Celestial Realm as a reserve unit. You can set up one reserve unit in the Celestial Realm for each unit you have set up on the battlefield. At the end of your movement phase, you can set up one or more of the reserve units in the Celestial Realm on the battlefield, more than 9" from any enemy units. Any reserve units in the Celestial Realm that are not set up on the battlefield before the start of the fourth battle round are slain.
        Shock and Awe Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target friendly STORMCAST ETERNAL units that were set up on the battlefield during the same turn.
        Stormhosts If your army is a Stormcast Eternals army, you can give it a Stormhost keyword. All STORMCAST ETERNAL units in your army gain that keyword. If a model already has a Stormhost keyword, it cannot gain another one, but this does not prevent other units in your army from having a different Stormhost keyword. You can either choose one of the Stormhosts in the list, or choose another Stormhost you've read about or created yourself. If you choose from the list below, all units with that keyword benefit from the extra abilities listed for that Stormhost. If you choose a different Stormhost, simply pick the Stormhost that most closely matches the nature of your own Stormhost.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details
        Heroes of Another Age You can use this command ability in your hero phase. If you do so, pick a friendly ANVILS OF THE HELDENHAMMER unit wholly within 9" of a friendly ANVILS OF THE HELDENHAMMER HERO, or wholly within 18" of a friendly ANVILS OF THE HELDENHAMMER HERO that is a general. That unit can attack with all of the missile weapons it is armed with, or make a pile-in move and attack with all of the melee weapons it is armed with. You cannot pick the same unit to benefit from this command ability more than once per hero phase.

    • Game Options

      • Game Type

        Selections: No Points or Battlerole Validation (Open)

        Categories: Game Options

    • Command Points [100pts]

      • Purchased Command Points [100pts]

        Selections: 2x 1 Command Point [100pts]

        Categories: Command Points

Force Rules

At the Double: You can use this command ability after you make a run roll for a friendly unit that is within 6" of a friendly HERO, or 12" of a friendly HERO that is a general. If you do so, the run roll is treated as being a 6.

Forward to Victory: You can use this command ability after you make a charge roll for a friendly unit that is within 6" of a friendly HERO, or 12" of a friendly HERO that is a general. If you do so, re-roll the charge roll.

Inspiring Presence: You can use this command ability at the start of the battleshock phase. If you do so, pick a friendly unit that is within 6" of friendly HERO, or 12" of a friendly HERO that is a general. That unit does not have to take battleshock tests in that phase.
